TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit BitmapPalettes extends System.Object
public ref class BitmapPalettes abstract sealed

summary.span: 定义通常由位图图像使用的多个调色板。

span.span: Defines several color palettes that are commonly used by bitmap images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用"透明"其名称末尾有一个额外的"颜色"的属性是完全透明的。 properties whose names end with "Transparent" have an additional "color" that is fully transparent. 如果已有 256 种颜色的调色板，最后一种颜色将替换为透明色的调色板。In the case of palettes that already have 256 colors, the last color is replaced by the transparent color. 仅[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]图像格式支持调色板。Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] image formats support palettes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造一个新使用的成员类似的方式的类。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new by using a member of the class in a similar way. [!code-csharp[bitmapframeexample#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#10)] [!code-vb[bitmapframeexample#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property BlackAndWhite As BitmapPalette

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值表示包含黑、白色的调色板。

span.span: Gets a value that represents a black-and-white color palette.

summary.span: 调色板共由 2 种颜色组成。

span.span: This palette consists of 2 colors total.
An instance of .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造一个新使用的成员类。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new by using a member of the class. 虽然此示例演示如何使用属性，可以使用的任何成员类似的方式的类。Although this example shows how to use the property, you can use any member of the class in a similar way. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用"透明"其名称末尾有一个额外的"颜色"的属性是完全透明的。 properties whose names end with "Transparent" have an additional "color" that is fully transparent. 如果已有 256 种颜色的调色板，最后一种颜色将替换为透明色的调色板。In the case of palettes that already have 256 colors, the last color is replaced by the transparent color. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造一个新使用的成员类。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new by using a member of the class. 虽然此示例演示如何使用属性，可以使用的任何成员类似的方式的类。Although this example shows how to use the property, you can use any member of the class in a similar way.
